hypothesis_content.title: BTC Volatility Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences a volatility squeeze (Bollinger Band width < 0.05) in a NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent breakout direction with >150% of average volume will sustain for 48 hours with >3% follow-through.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression in neutral markets often precedes significant directional moves. Volume confirmation filters false breakouts. Neutral regimes provide cleaner technical setups without strong directional bias.
entry_conditions: BTC 4h Bollinger Band width (20,2) < 0.05 for 3 consecutive periods
Price breaks above upper BB or below lower BB
Volume on breakout candle > 150% of 20-period average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3.5% move in breakout direction from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Breakout candle low (for long) or high (for short) invalidated
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout direction reverses within 4 hours >70% of the time, or volume-confirmed breakouts fail to reach 2% follow-through >60% of instances.
